attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why is it ive been let down by the goverment? the working class is always hit bigest. yet its our surport that wins the day? ive worked last 13 years paid my dues to the goverment now im unemployed & had my 187 days im now reduced to live on a decrease to 21 pound a week. but you will give a imergrint 200 pounds and put them up in hotels? wot dues have they paid. ? i think next election ile vote b.n.p thank you im not proud to be british any more.

rejection.details: Please be more specific about the action you are requesting.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
